mapper.select: select CONF_INDEX,CONF_TITLE,CONF_ROOM_INDEX, CONF_DATE, CONF_START, CONF_END, CONF_RE_INDEX, CONF_RE_EMP_INDEX, CONF_RE_CONF_INDEX, EMP_ID from conf,conf_re,emp where conf.conf_index = conf_re.conf_re_conf_index and conf_re.conf_re_emp_index = emp.emp_INDEX
select CONF_INDEX, CONF_TITLE, CONF_ROOM_INDEX, CONF_DATE, CONF_START, CONF_END, CONF_EMP_INDEX_SEND,EMP_ID from conf,emp where conf.conf_emp_index_send = emp.emp_index
